com.amadeus.android.domain.hotel.apis

Interface BookingApi


  • @JvmSuppressWildcards
public BookingApi

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingApi

        public BookingApi()

    • Method Detail

      • createBooking

        @POST
 @Nullable
java.lang.Object createBooking(@Body @NotNull
                                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> body,
                                                @NotNull
                                                kotlin.coroutines.Continuation<retrofit2.Response> p)

        BOOK ROOMS This service allows the user to book the offer retrieved from Hotel Shopping API. The minimum mandatory parameters are: - offerId - guest name and contact The user can also specify payment details. For multiple rooms, guests and payments identifiers can be defined for the repartition. The room object contains the list of guests identifiers, one payment identifier and one special request. In case the offerId refers to more than one room, it is recommended that the user defines guests ditribution in each room. In case multiple guests are defined in guest details and no distribution is provided, each guest is assigned to a separate room. If the booking is successful, the provider confirmation number is returned in the response. In case of multiple rooms, several confirmation numbers are returned: one per room. ### Query example POST /v1/booking/hotel-bookings HTTP/1.1 Host: test.api.amadeus.com Content-Type: application/vnd.amadeus+json Content-Encoding: gzip Accept-Encoding: gzip { \"data\": { \"offerId\": \"63A93695B58821ABB0EC2B33FE9FAB24D72BF34B1BD7D707293763D8D9378FC3\", \"guests\": {\"name\":{\"title\":\"MR\",\"firstName\":\"BOB\",\"lastName\":\"SMITH\"},\"contact\":{\"phone\":\"+33679278416\",\"email\":\"bob.smith@email.com\"}}, \"payments\": {\"method\":\"creditCard\",\"card\":{\"vendorCode\":\"VI\",\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"expiryDate\":\"2023-01\"}} } } ### Response example HTTP/1.1 201 Created Content-Type: application/vnd.amadeus+json Content-Encoding: gzip { \"data\": {\"type\":\"hotel-booking\",\"id\":\"XD_8138319951754\",\"providerConfirmationId\":\"8138319951754\"} } The endpoint is owned by defaultname service owner

        See Also:
        {\"name\":{\"title\":\"MR\",\"firstName\":\"BOB\",\"lastName\":\"SMITH\"},\"contact\":{\"phone\":\"+33679278416\",\"email\":\"bob.smith@email.com\"}}, {\"method\":\"creditCard\",\"card\":{\"vendorCode\":\"VI\",\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"expiryDate\":\"2023-01\"}}, {\"type\":\"hotel-booking\",\"id\":\"XD_8138319951754\",\"providerConfirmationId\":\"8138319951754\"}
